reference_summary:
UPHUNAL Handmade Short Coffin False Nails Set Long Press on Nails Fake Nails 24Pcs for Any Occasions Reusable Acrylic Matte Artificial Nails with Nail File Gifts for Women and Girls (Cute Pink)
UPHUNAL
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'UPHUNAL', 'Coverage': 'Half Well Tips', 'Number of Pieces': '24', 'Shape': 'Ballerina', 'UPC': '735626573330'}
These nails are adorable, not your average designs and pretty charming because they look handmade. I am disappointed this set doesnt come with glue (just the little sticker pads) but I have some on hand so no big deal. Also there are so few of the cute design nails, mostly just the black ones.
Edgy designs cute style
(YOUMIDI) Brush and Cat Brush-Smooth combing brush for short and long hair-Pet shedding combing brush, which can remove loose hair, mats, tangles (Gray)
youmidi
{'Brand': 'Youmidi', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.31 x 5.04 x 2.28 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': '021', 'UPC': '768647685706'}
We ordered this brush to help train our puppy to enjoy being brushed because the bristles are small and it wont pull on him too much. He enjoys us running it over his coat, but we're working on building up his tolerance to it so we haven't gotten to brush him with it fully. He is a husky mix with a short length coat. The brush is really easy to clean when needed,  just press the button.
great for training puppy
By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan
By Terry
{'Brand': 'By Terry', 'Item Form': 'powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.15 x 0.75 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3700076457087'}
This powder is awesome because of the color it will always match with my foundation. It goes on a little white, but after letting it set for a few minutes it dusts off to be completely clear. I love the compact and think this powder holds up well with setting spray.
great matte powder

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Style Preference**: Enjoys unique and handmade designs, particularly attracted to edgy and cute aesthetics.
- **Product Types**: Strong interest in false nails and cosmetic products that enhance makeup longevity and appearance. Recently, this interest has extended to body luminizers and illuminators that offer effective and visually appealing finishes.
- **Material Preference**: Prefers high-quality, durable materials; favors acrylics for nails and non-sticky formulations in cosmetics for optimal user experience.
- **Design Focus**: Seeks visually striking patterns, finishes, and effective coverage in beauty items, valuing products that are both functional and stylish.
- **Functionality and Usability**: Values reusability and practical applications, favoring multifunctional grooming tools and cosmetic items that enhance usability and performance.
- **Price Sensitivity**: Evaluates products based on features and design rather than cost alone, seeking high-quality beauty items that deliver excellent performance and satisfaction.
- **Review Behavior**: Provides constructive feedback, focusing on the effectiveness, ease of use, and positive user experience. Typically rates products between 4.0 to 5.0, reflecting a strong satisfaction with those that meet aesthetic and functional expectations.
- **Overall Rating**: Generally favors products that highlight creativity and practicality, ensuring a harmonious blend of style and function across various categories.

The user prioritizes distinctive, multifunctional items that combine creativity, style, and practicality in beauty and grooming products.
